name: Davra Networks
tag_list: cisco-eem, davra-eemlive, network-automation, proactive-network-management, network-management, cisco
overview:
Davra Networks is a recognized market leader in the development of software, solutions and services that take advantage of Ciscoâ€™s Embedded Event Manager (EEM) management subsystem and other Cisco based embedded instrumentation technologies.

Our Solutions enable CIOs and Network Managers to move IT away from the cost center mindset and deliver on their promises of innovation, productivity and competitive advantage by utilizing affective Network Automation and Proactive Network Management.

For more information on the Davra portfolio of products and solution for Cisco Based IT infrastructures please contact us at info@davranetworks.com

milestones.description: Industry Veteran Paul Glynn joins Davra Networks as CEO. Paul has over 15 year C-Level Experience in the industry & was Co-Founder\Executive Director of Crannog Software a successful Network Management Company which was acquired by Fluke Networks in 2008.
milestones.source_description: Paul Glynn Joins Davra as CEO

milestones.description: Davra Networks receives 500k expansion investment from AIB Capital Fund and Irish Government Ageny Enterprise Ireland.
Davra Networks flagship product RuBAN\EEMLive has just passed Cisco Interoperability Testing and is now  Cisco Compatible. Davra offical Development Partner.
Davra Networks looks to the US Market with Soft Launch at Cisco Live Las Vegas. http://twitpic.com/5s1gya
